list.name: POWER-SURGE
list.description: Surge overloads his circuits and increases his upgrade stage by x for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Surge overloads his circuits and increases his upgrade stage by x for x seconds.

list.name: POWER-SHIELD
list.description: Within the next x seconds, Surge consumes x% of the damage of the next incoming hit and uses the energy to reload x ammo.
list.descriptionHtml: Within the next x seconds, Surge consumes x% of the damage of the next incoming hit and uses the energy to reload x ammo.
